title: Pxer - Maybe the best in all of tools for Pixiv.net

phrase.getWorksEasy: Get all works or collections for one person quickly
phrase.filterIsVarious: Get the search result and afiltered by tag, score etc...
phrase.supportAllOs: Support Windows, Mac and Linux system
phrase.downloadIsNeedless: Running in your browser, download is needless
phrase.maybeTheBest: Maybe the best in all of tools for Pixiv.net
phrase.designForPixiv: A tool for Pixiv.net. Open source, free and easy to use

steps.afterInstallTampermonkey: After Tampermonkey installed, you should see a new button on the browser navigate bar, like the image below. Go next if you have sew it.
steps.clickToInstallPxer: Make sure you have installed Tampermonkey, then click the button below for install Pxer
steps.installPxerResultCase: There is the result for install below
steps.installPxerSuccess: Success! Click the "install" button for install
steps.installPxerFailOpenSource: Fail, the browser open the source of Pxer. Maybe you haven't installed Tampermonkey correctly
steps.installPxerFailDownloadFile: Fail, the browser downloaded a file. Maybe you haven't installed Tampermonkey correctly
steps.goToExtensionStore: Go to the extension store of browser
steps.letUsTryIt: Pxer install successful! Let's try is now !
steps.pxerWillAppear: When you enter some pages in Pixiv, the pxer will appeared on top of page

seo.author: pea3nut
seo.description: Pxer is a tool for pixiv, it can get picture of pixiv very quickly. It's free and open source
